fr.univrennes1.cri.jtacl.core.monitor
Class ProbesTracker

java.lang.Object
  fr.univrennes1.cri.jtacl.core.monitor.ProbesTracker

public class ProbesTracker
extends java.lang.Object

This class is reponsible of tracking probes over our virtual network.

Author:
Patrick Lamaiziere

checkFinalProbePath

public boolean checkFinalProbePath()
Checks if the path taken by of all final probes is unique.

Returns:
true if the path taken by all final probes is unique.

getRoutingResult

public RoutingResult getRoutingResult()
Returns the routing result of this tracker. The result is ROUTED if all probes have reached their destination, NOTROUTED if all probes have not reached their destinationn, and UNKNOWN otherwise.

Returns:
the RoutingResult of this tracker.

getAclResult

public AclResult getAclResult()
Returns the global ACL result of this tracker.
The global result is ACCEPT if all probes have reached their destination and all probe's results are ACCEPT.
If at least one probe's result is DENY, the global result is DENY.
If at least one probe's result is MAY or the routing result is not ROUTED, then the global result is MAY.

Returns:
the AclResult of this tracker.
